00030 /* 
00031  * Helper class for reading hgr scene files. 
00032  * See maxexport and Scene::Scene for usage examples
00033  * and hgr-fileformat.txt for documentation.
00034  * @ingroup hgr
00035  */
00036 class SceneInputStream :
00037     public io::DataInputStream
00038 {
00039 public:
00041     enum DataFlags
00042     {
00044         DATA_MATERIALS      = 1,
00046         DATA_PRIMITIVES     = 2,
00048         DATA_NODES          = 4,
00050         DATA_ANIMATIONS     = 8,
00052         DATA_USERPROPERTIES = 16,
00053     };
00054 
00056     static const int MIN_VERSION;
00057 
00059     static const int MAX_VERSION;
00060 
00065     explicit SceneInputStream( io::InputStream* in );
00066 
00068     ~SceneInputStream();
00069 
00074     math::float3            readFloat3();
00075 
00080     math::float4            readFloat4();
00081 
00086     math::quaternion        readQuaternion();
00087 
00092     math::float3x4          readFloat3x4();
00093 
00098     P(TransformAnimation)   readTransformAnimation();
00099 
00104     P(KeyframeSequence)     readKeyframeSequence();
00105 
00111     P(UserPropertySet)      readUserPropertySet( Scene* scene=0 );
00112         
00118     void                    readVertexFormat( gr::VertexFormat* vf );
00119 
00125     P(gr::Primitive)        readPrimitive( gr::Context* context, int* materialindex );
00126 
00133     void                    readNode( Node* node, int* parentindex );
00134 
00138     int                     version() const             {return m_ver;}
00139 
00144     bool                    hasData( int flags ) const;
00145 
00146 private:
00147     int     m_ver;
00148     int     m_dataFlags;
00149 
00150     SceneInputStream( const SceneInputStream& );
00151     SceneInputStream& operator=( const SceneInputStream& );
00152 };
